name: Pandolino
description:
TK Game Jam 2018 Submission. Theme - Color/Cover/Trains.

You control a charming chameleon who unfortunately is not in possesion of a ticket for Pandolino. Use his color changing powers to hide from ticket inspectors. Oh, and try to find some tasty flies for dinner.

Programming: Grzegorz Górski

Art: Natalia Słomowicz

Audio: freemusicarchive.org, freesfx.co.uk, youtube.com, freesound.org

Icons: game-icons.net, kenney.nl, pixabay.com
